p: The scaffolds from in vitro plantlets were used to detect SSR using MISA (MIcroSAtellite identification tool) [ 71]. The minimum number of repeats was set to 10, 6, 5, 5, 5, and 5 for mono-, di-, tri-, tetra-, penta-, and hexanucleotides, respectively. The statistics of SSR motifs were analyzed by Excel 2019 and plotted using the Python matplotlib package and Tableau.
